name: Parting, Inc.
description: Operator of a funeral house marketplace intended to find and compare local funeral services. The company's platform has an inbuilt searchable database to find and compare local funeral homes, read reviews, view photographs, find locations, and compare prices offered by other funeral service providers, enabling users to find and book funeral homes, save money and avoid time lagging hassles during cremation.
